sentences.english: I broke my nose, so I was injured.
sentences.chinese: 我断过鼻梁，所以受伤了。

sentences.english: Steel-rimmed glasses rode down on her nose .
sentences.chinese: 她鼻梁上架着一副钢丝边眼镜。

sentences.english: She has high nose, jet-black straight hair hang down her waist.
sentences.chinese: 她高鼻梁，乌黑的直发垂下她的腰部。

sentences.english: For the older child, measure from earlobe to bridge of nose to xiphoid .
sentences.chinese: 较大的儿童应量耳垂到鼻梁再到剑突的长度。

sentences.english: Peter perched a pair of gold-rimmed spectacles on his nose.
sentences.chinese: 彼得的鼻梁上架着一副金丝边眼镜。

sentences.english: Alex’s glasses had broken at the nose bridge, and he was holding them together with a wad of first-aid tape.
sentences.chinese: 他鼻梁上的眼镜坏了，用一个急救带粘着。

sentences.english: Two gin- scented tears trickled down the sides of his nose.
sentences.chinese: 他鼻梁两侧流下了带着酒气的泪。

sentences.english: She has bright eyes and high nose bridge.
sentences.chinese: 她有一双明亮的眼睛和高高的鼻梁。

sentences.english: Shen Kaishun said that inspection was beaten nose fracture.
sentences.chinese: 申开顺说检查后得知鼻梁被打骨折了。

sentences.english: And her powerful right arm sends her fist crashing into the large girl's mouth and nose.
sentences.chinese: 然后抡起有力的右拳砸向了那个大块头女孩的鼻梁骨。

sentences.english: She had bright eyes and high naes bridge.
sentences.chinese: 她有一双明亮的眼晴和高高的鼻梁。

sentences.english: Mr Jia is not very tall. He is wearing a glasses.
sentences.chinese: 贾老师个子不高，高高的鼻梁上架着一副眼镜。

sentences.english: The muzzle is fairly long with nasal bone straight, broad and parallel to the top of the skull.
sentences.chinese: 相当长，鼻梁骨直，宽，于脑袋相互平行。

sentences.english: My mother has a small mouth and a Roman nose.
sentences.chinese: 我的妈妈高鼻梁，小嘴巴。

sentences.english: Position the respirator under you chin with the nosepiece up.
sentences.chinese: 将呼吸器置于下颚下端，并且将鼻梁夹朝上。

sentences.english: Her high nose are her most striking feature .
sentences.chinese: 高鼻梁是她容貌最显著的特点。

definition: the wing of the nose/ala nasi
temple (on the sides of human head)
